help.description: Displays available commands and a description.

play.description: Queues a song to play in Discord. Can receive a video-url of search terms.

aww.description: Sends a cute picture from r/aww into your channel.

disconnect.description: Disconnects the bot from the voiceChannel it's connected to.

dmg.description: Gets a __dank__ meme from r/dankmemesgang, deletes it and send a shitty meme to your channel.

kitty.description: Sends you a kitty that makes you go `awwwwww`.

move.description: Moves song at position X to position Y.

np.description: Tells you which song is playing at the moment.

pause.description: Pauses the song, when playing, duh.

playnext.description: Plays a song, but places it next up in the queue.

playpl.description: Queues a playlist of videos to be played.

purge.description: Performs a purge on the messages sent by the bot, and sent to the bot.

queue.description: Tells you which songs are currently queued.

remove.description: Yeets a song at X position in the queue.

restart.description: Starts the current song from te start.

summon.description: Summons bot into your current voiceChannel.

volume.description: Changes current volume. Displays it when no argument given
